title: Missing Semicolon
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE active = 1
explanation: Missing semicolon at end of statement. Should end with ;

title: Basic SELECT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This is a valid SQL SELECT statement.

title: Column Name Typo
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT id, usernme, email
FROM users;
explanation: Typo in column name: 'usernme' should be 'username'.

title: WHERE Clause
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid use of WHERE with AND condition.

title: String Quotes
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name = "John";
explanation: Double quotes are for identifiers in standard SQL. Use single quotes for strings.

title: ORDER BY
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price DESC;

title: Missing FROM
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT id, name
WHERE active = 1;
explanation: Missing FROM clause. SELECT requires FROM.

title: LIMIT Clause
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
LIMIT 10;

title: Aggregate Without GROUP BY
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT category, COUNT(*)
FROM products;
explanation: category in SELECT requires GROUP BY category.

title: GROUP BY
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid GROUP BY with aggregate function.

title: HAVING Without GROUP BY
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM products
HAVING price > 100;
explanation: HAVING requires GROUP BY. Use WHERE for row filtering.

title: HAVING Clause
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT category, AVG(price) as avg_price
FROM products
GROUP BY category
HAVING AVG(price) > 50;

title: JOIN Missing ON
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: JOIN requires ON clause, not WHERE for join condition.

title: INNER JOIN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid INNER JOIN with ON clause.

title: Alias Reference Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: After aliasing to 'o', must use 'o.status' not 'orders.status'.

title: Table Alias
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: NULL Comparison
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE deleted_at = NULL;
explanation: Cannot use = for NULL. Use IS NULL instead.

title: IS NULL
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE deleted_at IS NULL;
explanation: Correct NULL comparison with IS NULL.

title: Invalid BETWEEN
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM orders
WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2024-01-31' AND '2024-01-01';
explanation: BETWEEN requires lower value first. Dates are reversed.

title: BETWEEN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM orders
WHERE total BETWEEN 100 AND 500;

title: INSERT Missing VALUES
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (name, email)
('John', 'john@example.com');
explanation: Missing VALUES keyword before the values list.

title: INSERT Statement
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (name, email)
VALUES ('John', 'john@example.com');

title: UPDATE Missing WHERE
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
UPDATE users
SET active = 0;
explanation: Dangerous! No WHERE clause will update ALL rows.

title: UPDATE Statement
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: DELETE All Rows
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: DELETE FROM orders;
explanation: Dangerous! No WHERE clause will delete ALL rows.

title: DELETE Statement
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: Subquery Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE id = (SELECT user_id FROM orders);
explanation: Subquery returns multiple rows. Use IN instead of =.

title: Subquery IN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM orders);

title: CREATE TABLE Type Error
description: Find the line with the error.

title: CREATE TABLE
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: Foreign Key Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Wrong syntax. Should be: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id).

title: Foreign Key
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: DISTINCT Placement
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT id, DISTINCT category
FROM products;
explanation: DISTINCT must come right after SELECT.

title: DISTINCT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT DISTINCT category
FROM products;

title: LIKE Pattern Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE email LIKE '*@gmail.com';
explanation: SQL uses % for wildcard, not *. Should be '%@gmail.com'.

title: LIKE Wildcard
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name LIKE 'J%';

title: UNION Column Mismatch
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: UNION requires same number of columns in both SELECTs.

title: UNION
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: CASE Missing END
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT id,
    CASE status
        WHEN 'active' THEN 'Active'
        WHEN 'inactive' THEN 'Inactive'
FROM users;

title: CASE Expression
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT id,
    CASE
        WHEN price < 10 THEN 'Cheap'
        WHEN price < 100 THEN 'Medium'
        ELSE 'Expensive'
    END AS price_category
FROM products;
explanation: Valid CASE expression with ELSE and END.

title: LEFT JOIN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
LEFT OUTER users ON users.id = orders.user_id;
explanation: Missing JOIN keyword. Should be LEFT OUTER JOIN.

title: LEFT JOIN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid LEFT JOIN returns all users even without orders.

title: RIGHT JOIN Confusion
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: RIGHT JOIN returns NULLs for orders. WHERE orders.status filters them out.

title: CROSS JOIN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM sizes
CROSS JOIN colors;
explanation: Valid CROSS JOIN for cartesian product.

title: Self JOIN Error
description: Find the line with the error.

title: Self JOIN
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: Multiple JOIN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Cannot mix comma and JOIN syntax. Need separate JOIN clauses.

title: Multiple JOINs
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT o.id, u.name, p.title
FROM orders o
JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id
JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id;

title: Aggregate in WHERE
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT category, AVG(price)
FROM products
WHERE AVG(price) > 100
GROUP BY category;
explanation: Cannot use aggregate in WHERE. Use HAVING instead.

title: Aggregate SUM
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT user_id, SUM(total) AS total_spent
FROM orders
GROUP BY user_id
ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
explanation: Valid aggregate with alias in ORDER BY.

title: COUNT DISTINCT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(category)
FROM products;
explanation: DISTINCT should be inside COUNT: COUNT(DISTINCT category).

title: COUNT DISTINCT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT category) AS unique_categories
FROM products;

title: GROUP BY Position
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: GROUP BY must come after FROM, not before.

title: GROUP BY Multiple
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid GROUP BY with multiple columns.

title: ORDER BY Alias Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM products
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY count;
explanation: Alias is 'cnt' not 'count'. Use correct alias.

title: ORDER BY Expression
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price * quantity DESC;

title: OFFSET Without LIMIT
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
OFFSET 10;
explanation: OFFSET requires LIMIT in most databases.

title: LIMIT OFFSET
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid pagination with LIMIT and OFFSET.

explanation: If user_id contains NULL, NOT IN returns no rows. Use NOT EXISTS.

title: IN Subquery

title: ALL Operator Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Comparing electronics to itself. Returns no results.

title: ANY Operator
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: INSERT SELECT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO archive (id, name)
VALUES SELECT id, name FROM users;
explanation: Cannot use VALUES with SELECT. Remove VALUES.

title: INSERT SELECT
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: UPDATE JOIN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
UPDATE orders
SET orders.status = 'shipped'
JOIN shipments ON orders.id = shipments.order_id
WHERE shipments.shipped_at IS NOT NULL;
explanation: JOIN must come before SET in UPDATE.

title: UPDATE with JOIN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
UPDATE orders o
JOIN shipments s ON o.id = s.order_id
SET o.status = 'shipped'
WHERE s.shipped_at IS NOT NULL;

title: DELETE JOIN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: DELETE multi-table syntax needs proper JOIN.

title: DELETE with Subquery
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: ALTER TABLE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Missing comma between ADD COLUMN statements.

title: ALTER TABLE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid ALTER TABLE with multiple columns.

title: DROP COLUMN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
ALTER TABLE users
DELETE COLUMN temp_field;
explanation: Command is DROP COLUMN, not DELETE COLUMN.

title: DROP COLUMN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
ALTER TABLE users
DROP COLUMN temp_field;

title: MODIFY COLUMN Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
ALTER TABLE products
CHANGE COLUMN name VARCHAR(500);
explanation: CHANGE requires old and new column names. Use MODIFY.

title: MODIFY COLUMN
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
ALTER TABLE products
MODIFY COLUMN name VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL;

title: INDEX Name Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: CREATE INDEX ON users (email);
explanation: INDEX requires a name: CREATE INDEX idx_email ON users (email);

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: CREATE INDEX idx_users_email ON users (email);

title: UNIQUE INDEX Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Partial/filtered indexes not supported in all databases.

title: UNIQUE INDEX
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_users_email ON users (email);

title: VIEW Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
CREATE VIEW active_users
SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = 1;

title: CREATE VIEW
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
CREATE VIEW active_users AS
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE active = 1;

title: CTE Missing AS
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Missing AS keyword after CTE name.

title: CTE
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: Recursive CTE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
WITH RECURSIVE tree AS (
    SELECT id, parent_id, name FROM categories WHERE parent_id IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.name
    FROM categories c JOIN tree t ON c.parent_id = t.id
)
SELECT * FROM tree;
explanation: Should use UNION ALL for recursive CTEs to avoid duplicate elimination.

title: Recursive CTE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
WITH RECURSIVE tree AS (
    SELECT id, parent_id, name, 0 AS level
    FROM categories WHERE parent_id IS NULL
    UNION ALL
    SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.name, t.level + 1
    FROM categories c JOIN tree t ON c.parent_id = t.id
)
SELECT * FROM tree;
explanation: Valid recursive CTE for hierarchical data.

title: Window Function Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: ROW_NUMBER needs ORDER BY in OVER clause.

title: ROW_NUMBER
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: PARTITION BY Error
description: Find the line with the error.

title: PARTITION BY
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid window function with PARTITION BY.

title: LAG Function Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT date, amount,
    LAG(amount) OVER (ORDER BY date) AS prev_amount,
    amount - prev_amount AS diff
FROM sales;
explanation: Cannot reference window alias in same SELECT. Need subquery.

title: LAG Function
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid LAG with offset and default.

title: COALESCE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT COALESCE(phone, email, ) AS contact
FROM users;

title: COALESCE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT COALESCE(phone, email, 'No contact') AS contact
FROM users;

title: NULLIF Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT total / NULLIF(quantity) AS unit_price
FROM orders;

title: NULLIF
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT total / NULLIF(quantity, 0) AS unit_price
FROM orders;
explanation: Valid NULLIF to prevent division by zero.

title: CAST Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT CAST(price, DECIMAL(10,2))
FROM products;
explanation: CAST uses AS: CAST(price AS DECIMAL(10,2)).

title: CAST
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT CAST(created_at AS DATE) AS created_date
FROM orders;

title: CONCAT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Cannot use alias in WHERE. Use CONCAT again or subquery.

title: CONCAT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name
FROM users;

title: SUBSTRING Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 0, 3) AS abbr
FROM products;
explanation: SQL uses 1-based indexing. Start from 1, not 0.

title: SUBSTRING
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT SUBSTRING(name, 1, 3) AS abbr
FROM products;

title: LENGTH vs LEN
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT name, LEN(name) AS name_length
FROM users;
explanation: LEN is SQL Server. MySQL uses LENGTH, PostgreSQL uses LENGTH or CHAR_LENGTH.

title: LENGTH
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT name, CHAR_LENGTH(name) AS name_length
FROM users;

title: REPLACE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
UPDATE products
SET description = REPLACE(description, old_text, new_text);
explanation: old_text and new_text are column references. Need strings.

title: REPLACE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
UPDATE products
SET description = REPLACE(description, 'old', 'new');

title: TRIM Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: SELECT TRIM(BOTH ' ' name) FROM users;
explanation: Missing FROM keyword: TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM name).

title: TRIM
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM name) AS trimmed_name
FROM users;
explanation: Valid TRIM with direction and character.

title: DATE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM orders
WHERE created_at = '2024-13-01';

title: DATE Format
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: DATEDIFF Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT DATEDIFF(created_at, NOW()) AS days_old
FROM orders;
explanation: DATEDIFF param order varies by DB. MySQL: (end, start), SQL Server: (unit, start, end).

title: DATE_ADD
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT DATE_ADD(created_at, INTERVAL 30 DAY) AS expires_at
FROM subscriptions;

title: EXTRACT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH, created_at) AS month
FROM orders;
explanation: EXTRACT uses FROM: EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at).

description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: DATE_FORMAT Error
description: Find the line with the error.

FROM orders;

title: DATE_FORMAT
description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted
FROM orders;

title: NOW vs CURRENT_DATE
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE event_date = NOW();

title: MERGE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
MERGE INTO target t
USING source s
ON t.id = s.id
WHEN MATCHED UPDATE SET t.name = s.name;
explanation: Missing THEN: WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET...

title: MERGE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
MERGE INTO target t
USING source s ON t.id = s.id
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.name = s.name
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, name) VALUES (s.id, s.name);

description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: EXCEPT ALL not supported in all databases. Some only support EXCEPT.

explanation: INTERSECT requires same number of columns.

title: UNION ALL Order
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE active = 1
ORDER BY name
UNION ALL
SELECT id, name FROM archived_users;
explanation: ORDER BY should be after all UNIONs.

title: UNION ALL
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT id, name FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT id, name FROM archived_users
ORDER BY name;
explanation: ORDER BY applies to final result.

title: Aggregate Alias WHERE
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM products
WHERE cnt > 5
GROUP BY category;
explanation: Can't use alias in WHERE. Use HAVING for aggregate conditions.

title: HAVING Aggregate
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM products
GROUP BY category
HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

title: GROUP_CONCAT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(product_name)
FROM orders
GROUP BY user_id
ORDER BY GROUP_CONCAT(product_name);
explanation: Performance issue: GROUP_CONCAT in ORDER BY is inefficient.

title: GROUP_CONCAT
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: IF NULL Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT IFNULL(phone, email, 'N/A') AS contact
FROM users;
explanation: IFNULL takes 2 args. Use COALESCE for multiple.

title: IFNULL
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT IFNULL(phone, 'No phone') AS phone
FROM users;

title: CONVERT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT CONVERT(price, VARCHAR)
FROM products;

title: CONVERT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT CONVERT(price, SIGNED INTEGER) AS int_price
FROM products;

title: ROUND Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT ROUND(price, -2) AS rounded
FROM products;
explanation: Negative precision rounds to tens/hundreds. May be unintended.

title: ROUND
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT ROUND(price, 2) AS rounded_price
FROM products;

title: FLOOR vs CEILING
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT FLOOR(rating) AS min_rating,
       CEIL(rating) AS max_rating
FROM products
WHERE FLOOR(rating) > CEIL(rating);
explanation: FLOOR is never > CEIL. Condition always false.

title: CEILING
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT CEILING(price / 10) * 10 AS rounded_up
FROM products;

title: ABS Comparison
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM transactions
WHERE ABS(amount) = -100;
explanation: ABS returns positive. Can never equal -100.

title: ABS
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM transactions
WHERE ABS(amount) > 1000;

title: MOD Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM items
WHERE id MOD 0 = 0;

title: MOD
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM items
WHERE id MOD 2 = 0;

title: RAND Seed
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: ORDER BY RAND() is slow for large tables.

title: RAND
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid random selection for small results.

title: STRING_AGG Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT STRING_AGG(name, ', ')
FROM products;
explanation: STRING_AGG is PostgreSQL/SQL Server. MySQL uses GROUP_CONCAT.

title: STRING_AGG
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: ARRAY_AGG Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: category not in SELECT but in GROUP BY.

title: ARRAY_AGG
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: FILTER Clause
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT COUNT(*) FILTER WHERE (status = 'active')
FROM users;

title: FILTER
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'active') AS active_count
FROM users;

description: Find the line with the error.

title: LATERAL
description: Is this code snippet correct?

description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Not all DBs support MATERIALIZED hint. PostgreSQL 12+ only.

title: CTE Materialized
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: TABLESAMPLE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: SELECT * FROM large_table TABLESAMPLE 10%;
explanation: Need method: TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (10) or TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (10).

title: TABLESAMPLE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SELECT * FROM large_table TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (10);

title: RETURNING Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (name) VALUES ('John')
RETURN id;

title: RETURNING
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: UPSERT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Should be ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE, not SET.

title: UPSERT MySQL
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: ON CONFLICT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: ON CONFLICT needs target: ON CONFLICT (id).

title: ON CONFLICT
description: Is this code snippet correct?

title: COPY Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: COPY users FROM 'data.csv' DELIMITER ','
explanation: Missing semicolon and possibly CSV format option.

title: COPY
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
COPY users FROM '/path/to/data.csv'
WITH (FORMAT CSV, HEADER TRUE);

title: VACUUM Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: VACUUM FULL users WHERE active = 0;

title: VACUUM
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: VACUUM (VERBOSE, ANALYZE) users;

title: ANALYZE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: ANALYZE users(email);
explanation: PostgreSQL: ANALYZE users (email);. MySQL: ANALYZE TABLE users;

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: ANALYZE users;

title: REINDEX Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: REINDEX idx_users_email;
explanation: Need INDEX keyword: REINDEX INDEX idx_users_email;

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: REINDEX TABLE users;

title: SHOW Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: SHOW INDEXES FROM users WHERE key_name = 'PRIMARY';
explanation: WHERE with SHOW not supported. Use information_schema.

title: SHOW
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SHOW CREATE TABLE users;

title: DESCRIBE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: DESCRIBE DATABASE mydb;
explanation: DESCRIBE is for tables: DESCRIBE users;

title: DESCRIBE
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: DESCRIBE users;

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_name = users;

description: Is this code snippet correct?

codeSnippet: SET sql_mode = STRICT_TRANS_TABLES;

description: Is this code snippet correct?

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name COLLATE utf8_bin = 'John';

description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci = 'john';

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM articles
WHERE MATCH(content) = 'database';

SELECT * FROM articles
WHERE MATCH(title, content) AGAINST ('+mysql -oracle' IN BOOLEAN MODE);

title: REGEXP Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE email REGEXP '^[a-z]+@gmail.com$';

SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name REGEXP '^[A-Z]';

title: SOUNDS LIKE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name SOUNDS LIKE 'Jon';
explanation: SOUNDS LIKE may not find exact phonetic matches for all names.

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE SOUNDEX(name) = SOUNDEX('John');

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (id, name)
VALUES (UUID, 'John');

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (id, name)
VALUES (UUID(), 'John');

title: MD5 Usage
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: MD5 is insecure for passwords. Use proper hashing.

title: MD5
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SELECT MD5('hello') AS hash;

title: SHA2 Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT SHA2('password');
FROM users;

title: SHA2
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SELECT SHA2('hello', 256) AS hash;

title: AES_ENCRYPT Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT AES_ENCRYPT('data', 'key')
FROM users;
explanation: Returns binary. Need TO_BASE64 or HEX for storage.

title: AES_ENCRYPT
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SELECT TO_BASE64(AES_ENCRYPT('data', 'secretkey')) AS encrypted;

title: Spatial Query Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM places
WHERE ST_Distance(location, POINT(0, 0)) < 1000;
explanation: Need ST_GeomFromText or proper point constructor.

title: Spatial Query
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM places
WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(0 0)', 4326)) < 1000;

title: Interval Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE start_time > NOW() + 7 DAYS;

title: Interval
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE start_time > NOW() + INTERVAL 7 DAY;

title: DATE_SUB Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM logs
WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), '7 DAY');
explanation: DATE_SUB uses INTERVAL: DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY).

title: DATE_SUB
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM logs
WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);

title: TIMESTAMPDIFF Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(created_at, NOW(), DAY) AS days_old
FROM users;
explanation: Order is: unit, start, end. TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, created_at, NOW()).

title: TIMESTAMPDIFF
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, created_at, NOW()) AS months_old
FROM subscriptions;

title: LAST_DAY Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: SELECT LAST_DAY('2024-02') AS last_day;

title: LAST_DAY
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet: SELECT LAST_DAY('2024-02-15') AS end_of_month;

description: Find the line with the error.

SELECT * FROM events
WHERE DAYOFWEEK(event_date) = 0;

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE DAYOFWEEK(event_date) IN (1, 7);

title: YEAR Comparison
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR;
explanation: YEAR needs a date: YEAR(NOW()) or '2024'.

title: YEAR
description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT * FROM events
WHERE YEAR(created_at) = 2024;

title: BINARY Comparison
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE name BINARY = 'John';
explanation: BINARY before column: WHERE BINARY name = 'John'.

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE BINARY name = 'John';

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: SELECT CHARSET name FROM users;

FROM users;

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT FORMAT(price, '0.00') AS formatted
FROM products;
explanation: MySQL FORMAT: FORMAT(price, 2) uses integer for decimals.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT FORMAT(price, 2) AS formatted
FROM products;

description: Find the line with the error.

INSERT INTO archive_logs (id, message, created_at)
SELECT id, message FROM logs;
explanation: Column count mismatch: 3 columns vs 2 selected.

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO archive_logs (id, message, created_at)
SELECT id, message, created_at FROM logs WHERE created_at < '2024-01-01';
explanation: Valid INSERT SELECT with matching columns.

explanation: Updates ALL matching rows. May over-count.

description: Find the line with the error.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

REPLACE users (id, name)
VALUES (1, 'John');

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
REPLACE INTO users (id, name, email)
VALUES (1, 'John', 'john@example.com');

title: IGNORE Error
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: IGNORE comes after INSERT: INSERT IGNORE INTO.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

INSERT IGNORE INTO users (id, name)

title: Duplicate Key
description: Find the line with the error.
explanation: Table can only have one PRIMARY KEY.

title: Composite Primary
description: Is this code snippet correct?

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO users (id, name, email)
VALUES (1, NULL, 'test@example.com');
explanation: Will fail if name is NOT NULL.

title: NULL Handling
description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT name, COALESCE(phone, 'N/A') AS phone
FROM users;

title: Boolean Type
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE active = TRUE;
explanation: TRUE not supported in all DBs. MySQL uses 1.

title: Boolean Compare
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE active = 1;

title: TEXT Comparison
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM articles
WHERE content = 'exact match';
explanation: TEXT column equality may be slow. Use LIKE or full-text search.

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM articles
WHERE content LIKE '%keyword%';

title: BLOB Insert
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
INSERT INTO files (content)
VALUES (FILE_CONTENTS);
explanation: FILE_CONTENTS undefined. Need LOAD_FILE or hex.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

INSERT INTO files (name, content)
VALUES ('test.txt', LOAD_FILE('/path/to/file'));

title: Reserved Word
description: Find the line with the error.

title: Backticks
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid use of backticks for reserved words.

title: Case Sensitivity
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * from USERS
where ID = 1;
explanation: Mixed case may cause issues on case-sensitive systems.

title: Consistent Case
description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE id = 1;

title: Comment Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users /* comment
WHERE active = 1;

description: Is this code snippet correct?
codeSnippet:
-- Select active users
SELECT * FROM users
WHERE active = 1; /* Only active */

SELECT * FROM users
WHERE id IN ();
explanation: Empty IN list is invalid syntax.

WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);

SELECT * FROM users
SELECT * FROM orders;

SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT * FROM orders;

title: Alias Space Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT name AS 'User Name'
FROM users;
explanation: Spaces in aliases need backticks in MySQL: `User Name`.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

FROM users;

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = 1);

description: Is this code snippet correct?

(SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = 1) AS active_users;

title: Natural Join Issue
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SELECT * FROM users
NATURAL JOIN orders;
explanation: NATURAL JOIN is fragile. Schema changes break it.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT * FROM users
JOIN orders USING user_id;

title: FULL JOIN MySQL
description: Find the line with the error.

SELECT * FROM users u
FULL OUTER JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id;
explanation: MySQL doesn't support FULL OUTER JOIN.

explanation: Valid FULL JOIN alternative in MySQL.

title: Anti Join
description: Find the line with the error.

SELECT * FROM users
WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM orders WHERE user_id IS NULL);
explanation: Filtering IS NULL in subquery returns NULLs, NOT IN fails.

description: Is this code snippet correct?

SELECT id, amount,
    AVG(amount) OVER (
        ORDER BY id
        ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
        EXCLUDE CURRENT ROW
    ) AS avg_others
FROM sales;

    SUM(amount) OVER w,
    AVG(amount) OVER w

WINDOW w AS (ORDER BY date);

description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet:
SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000';
SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'Custom error';
explanation: SET should be part of SIGNAL.

title: CONDITION Error
description: Find the line with the error.
codeSnippet: DECLARE my_error FOR SQLSTATE '45000';
explanation: Missing CONDITION: DECLARE my_error CONDITION FOR.
